name: Eva AI Assistant - GPU Optimized
description: High-performance Telegram AI assistant with GPU acceleration for fast voice and AI processing
startScript:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'Starting Eva AI Assistant...'
cd /workspace
python eva_webhook.py
readme:
# Eva AI Assistant - RunPod Template

## Quick Start
1. Set your TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
2. Set your OPENAI_API_KEY
3. Update WEBHOOK_URL with your RunPod endpoint
4. Deploy and access via HTTP port 8000

## Features
- GPU-accelerated AI processing
- Voice transcription and synthesis
- Persistent memory with ChromaDB
- Multi-personality modes
- Web search capabilities

## Performance
- Voice processing: <1s
- Text responses: <0.5s
- Supports 50+ concurrent users

## Endpoints
- `/webhook` - Telegram webhook
- `/health` - Health check
- `/metrics` - Performance metrics
